DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the impact of impaired renal function on the pharmacokinetics of ART-123 in patients with Disseminated Intravascular Coagulation. To investigate the safety of ART-123 in patients with Disseminated Intravascular Coagulation.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Pharmacokinetics Study of ART-123 in Disseminated Intravascular Coagulation (DIC) Subjects With Renal Impairment
DOC.criteria: Japanese Association for Acute Medicinedefined DIC criteria score >= 4 Written informed consent from patient or guardian Patients showing intracranial, pulmonary, gastrointestinal hemorrhage Patients with a history of cerebrovascular disorders within the past 52 week Patients with a history of hypersensitivity to the ingredients of ART123 preparations Pregnant women, nursing mothers or possibly pregnant women
